item.description:
Sponsored by Kaplan (booth 16064), the National Associates Committee (NAC) Lounge will provide an opportunity for ARE candidates network and study together. It will also mark the launch of Kaplan?s ARE 4.0 Study Materials. In addition to studying, the lounge provides a place for interns to gather, meet their Regional Associate Director and learn about internship resources and convention activities. At the lounge will be: regular presentations on IDP, ARE, and study material prize drawings. There will also be an Internet connection for IDP applications, and an opportunity to schedule a version 3.1 ARE Division (version 4.0 sign-up begins May 18, 2008).

The Lounge is located on Meeting Level 2 East, near room 254.

Please join us there Wednesday through Friday, May 14-16, 2008 from 7AM to 6PM and Saturday, May 17, 2008 from 7AM to 3:30PM.
item.name: Convention - (Associates) NAC Lounge
